reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cardigan to be of nice quality with a great fit and deep red color, describing it as well-designed and looking expensive.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice cardigan
items.body: Very nice cardigan. Not too heavy or too thin. I love this green color. Arrived nicely packaged and on time. Runs just a little bit small. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE these cardigans!
items.body: I'm trying to write more reviews, both good and bad, because I rely on them so much when I buy things. This is truly a glowing review, and that doesn't happen often! I struggle with finding clothes that 1. I REALLY like 2. Fit well (and consistently, when buying multiple of an item) and 3. Are priced within my budget. These cardigans seem to check all of those boxes. I'd never bought clothing from Grace Karin before, but that's changing! I purchased the grey-blue and cerulean colored cardigans in a size S (I'm 5'5", 110lbs). Both cardigans fit the same (one would think the same size in a brand would fit the same in any color, but it seems to be a rarity!), and they fit well. There's definitely enough room for a short-or-long-sleeve shirt to go underneath, but they weren't too big or loose/baggy. The material was unexpectedly very soft...softer than other brands I've tried recently, and the colors were deep, vibrant and beautiful. The grey-blue looks more like a grey-purple in person, but that's actually what I was hoping for. I bought these on a "deal" for just under $21, which i think is very reasonable, especially considering the good quality. It has been a long time since I've had an automatic "go-to" when buying clothes, but after receiving the cardigans today, I bought 3 more! If you couldn't tell, I highly recommend these (and I didn't get them for free nor was I asked to review them!)! ;) Read more
items.author: cmp1079

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great color options and fit
items.body: Great quality, price, and value. The reason I gave it a 4 and not a 5 was I wish it was longer. I have long legs and torso. So find options that accommodate tall women can be difficult. Nonetheless, I bought several and will likely buy several more. It definitely helps to keep me warm. I usually wear them as an optional piece to throw on when I get cold. The color options ensures I stay color coordinated. If you take care of the piece, it will take care of you through time. Read more
items.author: Prescious Christina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Value, Luxury Feel Just size up for that designer appearance.
items.body: This sweater is an incredible value. It is well made and has a silky feel. My only advice is to size up one or two sizes so it has a generous feel. I usually wear a large and ordered and XXL. This size allows me to wear a blouse underneath and button the sweater so the button placket is not pulling. The cardigan is an excellent addition to your wardrobe for fall, winter and spring. Just remember to size up at least one size so it has a luxury feel and appearance. Read more
items.author: Cathie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: Real pretty sweater soft comfortable to wear bought in other colors Read more
items.author: I been taking this for over a months and it really works in my opinion

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty sweater
items.body: Item came stained with what looks like makeup or coffee - no clue. Too late to return (didn't open it right away). Fit, quality and color were excellent. I managed to remove the stains with hydrogen peroxide (I buy it in a spray bottle; it's my go to stain remover). Read more
items.author: pink

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality Cardigan, Runs a bit big
items.body: Really Good Quality Cardigan Sweater. The material is thick and soft, It feels like it is very expensive. Fits just like your standard cardigan. I got the XL and wish I had done the large, its a little bit big, but nothing to bad. If in between sizes size down. For reference i am a size 12/14. Read more
items.author: aberfitchgr534

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size
items.body: The fabric is soft and light weight, stretchy but not a lot, it is durable and stylish. So glad I finally found the sweaters I’ve been looking for. I colors are just as advertised in the picture. I do recommend. Read more
items.author: Rock

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Cerulean, Grass Green, Black, Camel, Coffee, Sea Green, Baby Blue, Royal Blue, Light Pink, Midnight Blue, Army Olive, Dark Pink, Light Apricot Heather, Golden Apricot. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
